# Pythia - AI Copilot Chat

AI-powered chat assistant integrated directly into the Delphi IDE.

## Features
- Chat with GPT-4 or Claude AI models
- Delphi-specific programming assistance
- Accessible via Tools menu or Ctrl+Alt+P

## Setup
1. After installation, open Tools > Pythia AI Chat
2. Click Settings to enter your OpenAI or Anthropic API key
3. Start chatting!

## API Keys
Get your keys from:
- OpenAI: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
- Anthropic: https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys
